data.app_name: Little Witch Academia: VR Broom Racing
data.description:
Soar through the skies, hunt for ghosts, and become the best witch racer in the world!

Enroll at the prestigious Luna Nova Witchcraft Academy and compete with your fellow student witches to win the prestigious Stella Cup.

Experience the thrill of flight across more than a dozen tracks! Cast magic to speed up and slow other teams down as you race to finish first! Purify the school’s restless spirits in special ghost hunting missions.

Use rewards from winning races and completing missions to buy new brooms, enhance your magic powers, and find the best combination to become the top student!

Play with the other users in online multiplayer and take in the sight of the world of Little Witch Academia together!

changelog.change_log:
- General bug fixes
- Added the items limited for the crowdfunding backers

“Hard Mode Update Ver.1.2.0”

- Added “Hard Mode”
 You can select “Hard Mode” under the option on the title screen.  
- Added a function to adjust the player angle during the races
- Updated the end credits
- Updated character animations
- General bug fixes

“Ver.1.1.1 Updates”
- Updated in-game texts
- Updated item 3D models
- General bug fixes

“Free Flight Update Ver.1.1.0”

- Added “Free Flight Mode”
 In “Free Flight Mode,” the player can fly freely around the school building of Luna Nova Witchcraft Academy with other players online. (Maximum 10 players will be randomly matched.)

- Added “Tutorial Section” to the title scene. 
   You can replay opening, calibration, and tutorial videos.

- Added the Skip function for the dialog scenes.
   Hold the trigger button of your wand hand or press the menu button to skip.

- Adjustment in the difficulty for Stages 10, 11, and 12
- Added new broom stars
- Updated animations and effects of the dialog scenes
- Updated character animations
- General bug fixes
- Added new visual effects to stages (*Quest 2 only)
- Added a race scene to the final stage (*Quest 2 only)

“Ver.1.0.1 Updates”
- Improved sensitivity of activating items during the race
- Adjustments in the avatar hair
- Updated character animations
- Updated animations and effects for the Final Stage 
- Updated in-game videos and images
- Updated the end credits with additional visuals
- General bug fixes
